mapper.select: select REPORTTYPENO, REPORTTYPE from BOARDREPORTTYPE order by REPORTTYPENO
mapper.insert: insert into BOARDREPORT(boardreportno, boardno, userno, reporttypeno, reportcontent, reportdate) values (BOARDREPORT_SEQ.nextval,#{boardNo},#{userNo},#{reportTypeNo},#{reportContent},sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.select: select COMMREPORTTYPENO, COMMREPORT from COMMREPORTTYPE order by COMMREPORTTYPENO
mapper.insert: insert into COMMREPORT(COMMREPORTNO, COMMNO, userno, COMMREPORTTYPENO, CONTENT, COMMREPORTDATE) values (COMMREPORT_SEQ.nextval,#{commNo},#{userNo},#{commReportTypeNo},#{content},sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.select: SELECT r.BOARDREPORTNO,r.BOARDNO, r.REPORTTYPENO, r.REPORTCONTENT, r.REPORTDATE, br.REPORTTYPE, b.CONTENT,b.NICKNAME FROM BOARDREPORT r LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARDREPORTTYPE br ON r.REPORTTYPENO = br.REPORTTYPENO LEFT OUTER JOIN BOARD b ON r.BOARDNO = b.BOARDNO

SELECT r.COMMREPORTNO,r.COMMNO, r.COMMREPORTNO, r.CONTENT, r.COMMREPORTDATE, br.COMMREPORT, b.COMMCONTENT, b.USERNO, u.nickname FROM COMMREPORT r LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMREPORTTYPE br ON r.COMMREPORTTYPENO = br.COMMREPORTTYPENO LEFT OUTER JOIN COMMENTTB b ON r.COMMNO = b.COMMNO left outer join USERTB u on b.USERNO = u.USERNO

SELECT i.itemno as itemNo, i.itemName , i.price, i.itemComm, i.remain, i.titleImg, it.fileno, it.stored_Name, it.origin_Name FROM item i LEFT JOIN itemfile it ON i.itemno = it.itemno WHERE i.itemno = #{itemNo}

mapper.select: SELECT ir.reportno, ir.itemno, ir.userno, ir.reportDate , irt.itemReportNo, ir.reportContent, irt.ITEMREPORT , itemname, nickname FROM item i, ITEMREPORT ir, ITEMREPORTTYPE irt, usertb u WHERE i.ITEMNO = ir.ITEMNO AND irt.ITEMREPORTNO = ir.ITEMREPORTNO AND ir.USERNO = u.USERNO
